dc_creator_sm: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries
dc_description_s: This is a scanned version of the 1962 paper map entitled: United States--East Coast, New York and New Jersey, Hudson and East rivers, Governors Island to 67th Street published by the United States Department of Commerce.  The map shows the depth measurements of  the Hudson and East Rivers Around Lower Manhattan.  The map was scanned at 300 dots per inch and is in the TIFF format.
dc_publisher_s: Dept. of Commerce : Coast and Geodetic Survey
dc_title_s: United States--East Coast, New York and New Jersey, Hudson and East rivers, Governors Island to 67th Street, 1962
